metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14947 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: OCS Inventory NG 2.7 allows Remote Command Execution via shellmetacharacters to require/commandLine/CommandLine.php because mib_file inplugins/main_sections/ms_config/ms_snmp_config.php is mishandled inget_mib_oid.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
